definition: to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨沖刷使粘土和有機物比沙粒更多的流入壟溝。

sentences.english: I couldn’t resist rolling down the window. As soon as I did, I heard waves crashing along the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住搖下車窗，立即聽到了波濤沖刷海岸的聲音。

sentences.english: Description : Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨沖刷使粘土和有機物比沙粒更多的流入壟溝。

sentences.english: An egg which is free from a foetus is the wave tide which wants quilt time to flush a discard.
sentences.chinese: 一個不受胎的蛋，是要被時間的浪潮沖刷成廢物的。

sentences.english: Wash with warm water, for other besmirch simply repeat the action.
sentences.chinese: 用溫水沖刷，對其他污漬只需重複該動作。

sentences.english: Would gush, flush, green these mountains and these valleys.
sentences.chinese: 將奮力噴出，沖刷滌盪，灌綠青山和這些山谷。

sentences.english: The paper further studies the scouring mechanism of groins through local groin model tests.
sentences.chinese: 通過丁壩局部模型試驗，進一步研究了丁壩沖刷機理。

sentences.english: The tees, landing areas and greens are all placed away from where runoff will collect.
sentences.chinese: 發球臺，落點區，果嶺都要遠離會被沖刷的區域。

sentences.english: If the flow of the beaches is gentle, the water energy is lessened as it washes up along the shore.
sentences.chinese: 如果海灘漲潮和緩，海水沖刷上岸時水能就會減少。

sentences.english: The flood has scored out a deep channel through the valley.
sentences.chinese: 洪水在山谷裏沖刷出一條很深的水澗。

sentences.english: The water polishes the rock "like glass."
sentences.chinese: 流水將岩石沖刷得像面玻璃，以致於她很難向上攀援。

sentences.english: Tar balls continue to wash up on beaches.
sentences.chinese: 焦油球繼續被沖刷到沙灘上。

sentences.english: For flushing canal by slop runoff, must build the cut off ditch.
sentences.chinese: 由於坡水引起的沖刷，則需修建截流溝。

sentences.english: Chisel Thruster with vibra force chips away at tough obstructions while flushing away debris.
sentences.chinese: 硬的堵塞物削成碎片，並將碎屑沖刷掉。

sentences.english: The rain washed the dirty swineherd's face, and he turned into the beautiful prince.
sentences.chinese: 雨水沖刷了豬倌的面龐，豬倌變成了英俊的王子。

sentences.english: The mechanism of white band formation is scouring.
sentences.chinese: 白亮帶形成的最重要機理是沖刷機理。

definition: lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
